role_summary_templates.meta_defining: {pokemon_name} dominates {best_use_case} with {key_strength}. Essential for competitive teams - prioritize building multiple copies with different movesets.
role_summary_templates.strong: {pokemon_name} excels as a {role} with {key_strength}. Core team member for {best_use_case} - worth significant stardust investment.
role_summary_templates.solid: {pokemon_name} performs reliably as a {role} in {best_use_case}. Solid choice for most players - build when you have spare resources.
role_summary_templates.situational: {pokemon_name} serves as a {role} for {specific_use}. Keep one copy for specific metas or when you need {type_coverage}.
role_summary_templates.limited: {pokemon_name} offers {backup_role} utility but is outclassed by better options. Build only if you lack alternatives in this role.
role_summary_templates.trash: {pokemon_name} lacks competitive viability in current meta. Transfer for candy - your stardust is better spent elsewhere.

count_explanation.high: Build multiple copies for different leagues and movesets. Priority investment for competitive players.
count_explanation.moderate: Keep {count} copies for specific roles. Good investment for most players.
count_explanation.single: One copy covers all use cases. Low-priority investment unless you need type coverage.
count_explanation.none: Skip building - better alternatives available. Transfer for candy.

special_forms.shadow: Shadow boost makes this a glass cannon - higher damage but lower bulk.
special_forms.mega: Mega evolution provides temporary raid dominance - save energy for key battles.
special_forms.gigantamax: Gigantamax form excels in Max Battles with enhanced stats and moves.

semi_serious.focus: Build versatile Pokemon that work across multiple formats

hardcore_casual.focus: Prepare for various metas without overwhelming investment
